message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product, and I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $95  - what do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your suggestion. I am willing to pay $85 for the product.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm holding out for something closer to $90.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $87.50?
I appreciate your offer, Alice. Considering my budget, I am able to pay $86 for the product.
